Articles.Content:
In the science mode on Xbox allows me to recover vessels though I’m in a orbit etc,I don’t know if it just my settings or a glitch,please help!

 

(I did fiddle around with settings,if it helps)
I'm having the same issues on PS4, no longer can recover any craft at all.

Which recover button are you both using? The pause menu one, or the hidden one behind the altimeter you press with the cursor?

I know the pause menu one can be bugged.
Why is this such a big deal? Just don't recover it!
